fullText:
Pouncing Form

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, druid, Primal Predator class feature, wild shape power
Benefit: When you use wild shape to change from your humanoid form to beast form, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 145.
name: Pouncing Form

benefit: When you use wild shape to change from your humanoid form to beast form, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
